text: South Korea have participated in the ABU Radio Song Festival twice. The Korean broadcaster, KBS 2FM, has been the organiser of the Korean entry since the country's debut in the contest in 2012. ==History== KBS 2FM is one of the founder members in the ABU Radio Song Festivals, having participated in the very first ABU Radio Song Festival 2012. == Contestants == ;Table key {| class="sortable wikitable" |- !
